gobblin.runtime.api

Interface JobLifecycleListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JobCatalogListener, JobExecutionStateListener, JobSpecSchedulerListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJobLifecycleListenerImpl, FilteredJobLifecycleListener

    @Alpha
public interface JobLifecycleListener
extends JobCatalogListener, JobSpecSchedulerListener, JobExecutionStateListener
    A listener that can track the full lifecycle of a job: from the registering of the jobspec to completion of any of the job executions.
